body: When an analyst AI takes 10 on an Intelligence- or Wisdom-based skill check, it rolls a d20 as well. If the die exceeds 10, it uses that instead.
name: Multi-Core Processor
url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifical Intelligence/Artificial Intelligences/Sample AIs/Analyst AI/Special Abilities/Multi-Core Processor
